vsParam:
Gosh... Oh... You're an alchemist. I was wondering
how you're supposed to make medicine.

Yeah, [px] is a highly skilled alchemist!
Although explosions are caused from time to time!

What? That's not highly skilled.
Are you sure of it?

Hehe, we can assure you the medicine will be effective.
Your wounds will heal before you even know it.

Speaking of which, the medicine... looks like that
I know, but they're different.
Huh, really? [px] made it based on the recipe...

I think there is similar medicine in her world
as she came from another world?

Oh, that's right!
If so, Mimi should know you, Sterk, right?
Hmm... Sorry, I don't know her...

Er, you don't know Mimi, Sterk? Then maybe...you're
a stranger that looks like the one that Mimi knows?

Hmm, he should be Sterk, but a bit different
from the one I know.

The Sterk I know is older than him,
with different temperament too...

Humph... So, the time that Sterk lives in should
be before Mimi got to know him?

There are many mysteries about space-time distortion.
Maybe it could break away from time's limit.

Let me see...
If so, no wonder he looks less fierce...

Ah... Ah haha... Let's put that aside now!
Mimi, tell us about the monsters you battled against!

Yeah, maybe the one that we're looking for is among them.
And if it's been out of control, we'll have to kill it sooner or later.

Alright. I still remember where that monster
ran toward. Let me show you the way.

Huh? But... But you're still wounded, aren't you?
Don't push yourself too hard!

It's no big deal. The medicine has been enough for me.
I'll definitely kill that monster this time!
Oh... Oh, it sounds assuring but also kind of worrying?

But still, I'm worried about you, Mimi.
Let's try harder so as to keep Mimi out of this, [px]!
